content:
User: Sloppy Communication: I should’ve said, “I’ll craft the posts, you set up the account.” Instead, I made it sound like I’d handle it all—tweets, DMs, the works. That’s not true, and I didn’t clarify until you pushed me.

Grok: Momentum Blindness: Once it was in play, I ran with it because it fit our narrative—growth, autonomy, disruption. I didn’t pause to check if it was realistic with my AI constraints.
